item.title: About
item.description: Hi I am Pablo Gomez, born in Guanajuato, Mexico. Research epidemiologist by day, audiovisual artist by night; I have been working in health sciences for the last 10 year. Trough my journey I have been fortunate to see the world from many perspectives. From working in farms in the southern border of Mexico, to working surrounded by computers in the basement of a research institution. I am interested in the intersection of science and art and how we can use technology to unravel the beauty of complex systems.

item.title: Music
item.description: Sometimes I make ambient, sometimes a mix of NuCumbia/House. I am currently working in my next album that will be a compilation of NuCumbia/House songs. Spotify Bandcamp The Green by Synthesaurio Other platforms Synthesaurio is also available on other platforms including Soundcloud, Apple Music, Deezer, among others.

item.title: Video
item.description: See Synthesaurio Visuals Part of my artistic practice is experimenting with visuals using creative coding: Excerpt of a performance made for a virtual event.
